latest_release.body:
## What's Changed

- Add support for Shopify Functions
- Add experimental support for Polaris Unified
- Add `get_started` tool so the agent can get more up-to-date information on how to work with specific Shopify APIs, such as Admin GraphQL, Shopify functions, Hydrogen, and Polaris web components
- Add `fetch_docs_by_path` so the agent can fetch full pages of documentation from shopify.dev
- Add instrumentation to the MCP server
